00069                LUAU_MESSAGE,

00135 typedef struct {
00136         /* Valid for all update types */
00137         char *id;                    
00138         GPtrArray *keywords;         
00139         AUpdateType type;            
00140         ADate *date;                 
00141         char *shortDesc;             
00142         char *fullDesc;              
00144         GPtrArray *quantifiers;      
00146         /* extra SOFTWARE parameters */
00147         APkgType availableFormats;   
00148         GPtrArray *packages;         
00149         char *newVersion;            
00150         char *newDisplayVersion;     
00151         AInterface interface;        
00153         /* extra MESSAGE parameters: none */
00154         
00155         /* extra LIBUPDATE parameters */
00156         char *newURL;                
00157 } AUpdate;

00160         AQuantType qtype;

00162         void *data;
00163 } AQuantifier;
